West_Covina.Northview High School (California): Northview High School is one of three comprehensive high schools within the Covina-Valley Unified School District, California, United States. Established in 1959, the school is located on 43 acres (170,000 m2) of land that is landscaped with trees, shrubs, and grass. Northview High School serves the cities of Covina and Irwindale.
